document_data.name: Gaspar
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaspar''' was a fishmonger who lived in [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: The fishmonger was of normal build and dressed grey clothing.
document_data.Activities: Gaspar sold [[knucklehead trout]] to be used by [[scrimshaw|scrimshawers]] from his warehouse with the help of [[Churin]].
document_data.Relationships: He had a son, [[Damien]] who liked to fish on the banks of [[Lac Dinneshere]].
document_data.History: During [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Gaspar ordered supplies from [[Ilmus Gallaway]] to aid Easthaven in the coming winter, but the caravan from [[Caer-Dineval]] was ambushed by [[orc]] raiders lead by an [[ogre]].
